A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The movie feels like two movies bolted together. They have included classic scenes that feel like they were lazily copied and sandwiched those between scenes full of slapstick humour. The tonal shifts are jarring. The story creates lots of questions but doesn't answer any and in fact If you expected a follow up to The Force Awakens with answers and plot development then you will be disappointed. This entire movie is filler and actually ruins all of the plot development in The Force Awakens so nothing really  happens or goes anywhere after two movies.
